code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import"./toggle.css";import Sun from'../../img/sun.png';import Moon from'../../img/moon.png';import{ThemeContext}from'../../context';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Toggle(){var theme=useContext(ThemeContext);var handleClick=function handleClick(){theme.dispatch({type:"TOGGLE"});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"t",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Sun,alt:"",className:"t-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Moon,alt:"",className:"t-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"t-button",onClick:handleClick,style:{left:theme.state.darkMode?0:25}})]});}export default Toggle;
